name: Course on Physics for INPHO Foundation & JEE Advance 2023
description: In this course, Nitin Sachan will provide in-depth knowledge of Physics. The course will be helpful for aspirants preparing for the olympiads (NSEP, INPHO) & JEE Advance 2023. Learners at any stage of their preparation will be benefited from the course. All doubts related to the topic will be clarified during the doubt clearing sessions in the course. Class dates and timings along with topic details are given below. The course will be covered in Hindi and the notes will be provided in English.

value.title: Kinematics: Snell’s Law and Problem Solving
Kinematics: Simple Harmonic Motion and Problem Solving
Kinematics of Circular Motion: Introduction and Using Polar Coordinates
Relative Motion: Types and Problem Solving
Relative Motion: River-Boat and Problem Solving
Relative Motion: River Flow, Angular Velocity of Swimmer, and Problem Solving
Relative Motion: Concepts of Approach and Problem Solving
Constraints, Instantaneous Axis of Rotation & Problem Solving
Projectile Motion - Part III & Doubt Clearing Session
